医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
新研究确定了心力衰竭的潜在药物目标由于患者的高患病率和有限的治疗选择，心力衰竭仍然是重大负担。心力衰竭分为两种主要的临床亚型 - 心力衰竭，并保留了射血分数（HFPEF）和心力衰竭，并减少了射血分数（HFREF）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250206/new-study-indistifies-potential-drug-targets-for for-heart-failure.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250206/new-study-indistifies-potential-drug-targets-for for-heart-failure.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=699d5edc-d096-43-43-9d6c-d6c-d68a040951b1 Thu, 06 Feb 2025 12:47:16 -0500 New study identifies potential drug targets for heart failure
巴西研究揭示了预防心房颤动的新途径最近发表在自然心血管研究中的巴西研究强调了预防和治疗心房颤动的有希望的途径，这种疾病大大增加了中风和痴呆症的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250206/brazilian-study-reveals-new-pathways-for-pathways-for-perventing-pathrial-atrial-fibrillation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250206/brazilian-study-reveals-new-pathways-for-pathways-for-perventing-forventing-atrial-fibrillation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=B656A217-274B-484F-854C-AA061F7C4DF6 Thu, 06 Feb 2025 12:42:05 -0500 Brazilian study reveals new pathways for preventing atrial fibrillation
GRANZYME K被确定为自身免疫性疾病中补体系统的关键触发因素我们的免疫系统武装着一系列旨在检测和消除有害威胁的防御措施。它最有力的防御机制之一是补体系统 - 一组巡逻我们身体的蛋白质，对感染或受伤的迹象保持警惕https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250206/granzyme-k-sideifud-sendified-as-key-trigger-complement-complement-complement-system-system-system-in-autommune-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250206/granzyme-k-sideifud-side-s-key-key-trigger-of-complement-complement-system-system-system-in-autoimmune-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id= ef328dba-4230-4230-4f9d-9f5a-5a-5ef8c1d6e7f3 Thu, 06 Feb 2025 12:23:45 -0500 Granzyme K identified as key trigger of complement system in autoimmune diseases
rufy1-ret融合被确定为肺癌中对劳拉替尼的抗性机制2025年2月5日在Oncotarget第16卷中发表了一份新病例报告，标题为“在患有CD74-ROS1重新排列的非小型细胞肺癌的患者中，获得了对Lorlatinib耐药的机制，作为对Lorlatinib抗性的机制：病例报告。 “ https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250206/rufy1-ret-fusion-nistified-isendified-and-as-mechanic---抗性 - 抗性 - 抗lorlatinib-in-lung-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250206/rufy1-ret-fusion-side--side--side--as-mechanism-of-1resistance-to-lorllatinib-inlung-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2272C215-FA69-458B-945D-C278ABC091E4 Thu, 06 Feb 2025 12:14:08 -0500 RUFY1-RET fusion identified as mechanism of resistance to lorlatinib in lung cancer
许多美国人在怀孕期间不知道心脏病的风险根据美国心脏病协会的数据，在过去的三十年中，美国与妊娠有关的死亡人数增长了140％，这是美国心脏病的主要原因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250206/many-americans-unaware-of-hert-disease-ferisks-during-pregnancy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250206/many-americans-americans-unaware-of-hert-disease-disease-fisks-during-pregnancy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=B5984662-CCA9-4E80-A912-8E77719EBAC17 Thu, 06 Feb 2025 12:06:30 -0500 Many Americans unaware of heart disease risks during pregnancy
KAIST团队发现分子切换到逆转癌细胞Kwang-hyun Cho教授的研究团队最近因开发一种不杀死癌细胞而开发的原始技术的工作而被强调，而仅杀死癌细胞，而只会改变其特征以将其逆转到类似于正常细胞的状态。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250206/kaist-team-discovers-molecular-switch-to-reverse-cancer-cancer-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250206/kaist-team-discovers-molecular-switch-to-redvers-cancer-cancer-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=920C63AD-4A78-413E-9384-F3B31A3FE42E Thu, 06 Feb 2025 11:51:00 -0500 KAIST team discovers molecular switch to reverse cancer cells
研究探讨了呼吸细菌对RSV严重程度的影响呼吸综合病毒（RSV）是两岁以下儿童下呼吸道感染的主要原因，导致了明显的发病率和全球医疗保健系统的巨大经济负担。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250206/study-explores-the--impact-octact-ost-respiratory-bacteria-on-rsv-severity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250206/study-explores-the-rimpact-the--impact-ost-resperatory-bacteria-on-rsv-severity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f28A468C-F20A-4DAC-85CD-08D49C27B63D Thu, 06 Feb 2025 11:37:35 -0500 Study explores the impact of respiratory bacteria on RSV severity
